input_text.Prompt:
Using the item specifications and item title, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Item title:
Grizzly C2125 Shaper Cutter with Double Lock Miter and 3/4-Inch Bore

Item specifications:
Grizzly 3/4-Inch bore shaper cutters feature top-quality c-2 carbide--the best available for wood cutting applications shaped and sharpened with dam
Double Lock Miter
Cutting length: 1-Inch
Can be used on wood, composites, plywood, and some plastics at 5,000 to 10,000 rpm

Product description:
input_text.Response A:
Are you in need of a reliable and efficient shaper cutter for your wood-working projects? Look no further than the Grizzly C2125 Shaper Cutter with Double Lock Miter and 3/4-Inch Bore!

With its top-quality C-2 carbide and double lock miter, this cutter is designed to provide precise and efficient cutting on a variety of materials, including wood, composites, plywood, and some plastics. The 3/4-inch bore and 1-inch cutting length make it a versatile tool for a range of applications, and it can be used at speeds of 5,000 to 10,000 RPM.

Don't settle for anything less than the best when it comes to your wood-working projects. Trust the Grizzly C2125 Shaper Cutter with Double Lock Miter and 3/4-Inch Bore to deliver the performance and results you need. Order yours today and experience the difference for yourself!
input_text.Response B: This Grizzly 1-Inch bore shaper cutter features top-quality C-2 carbide--the best available for wood cutting applications--shaped and sharpened with diamond abrasives for maximum cutting life. These double-locked miter cutters feature a high-quality steel body for strength and precision. All are individually straightened and heat-treated for accuracy. For accurate cuts, these cutters must be used in conjunction with a properly functioning shaper cutterhead and a good quality cutterholder. For best results, a cutterhead with spiral-flute cutting teeth should be used. These cutters can be used on wood, composites, plywood, and some plastics at speeds of 5,000 to 10,000 rpm.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
